website_summaries.verdict: Very high construction quality. Resin wicker design makes this box an attractive and useful addition to your yard.
pros: Cedar wood resists rot and discourages insects
Lovely appearance and large capacity make this deck box a winner
cons: Needs to be stained or sealed to avoid wood graying

customer_reviews.title: #1 purchase a heavy mallet from Amazon; #2 pray (seriously)
customer_reviews.text: #3) identify the pieces; #4) read the directions; #5 begin to assemble. As the weather was extremely hot, I did not assemble the entire item in one day. In fact, I assembled sections over three days. When I came to the directions for installing the hinges, I was certain they were rolling on the floor laughing at the factory. However, they were not that difficult to install. The mallet was essential to me. This can be assembled by an elderly female, working alone, wearing a modest nightgown, in her very private backyard.
customer_reviews.author: morningglory

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with Suncast. The lid of this box ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with Suncast. The lid of this box has warped upwards and now it collects water along the edge. When you open the lid, all that water falls into the box, defeating the purpose of its design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and plastic is not sturdy. It’s easy to assemble but the locking system keeps falling off, wind opens the lid and water gets in. Other manufacturers have a larger bin at cheaper price, I wish I did a better diligence before purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Moustapha El-amine

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO ASSEMBLE - GOOD QUALITY - WORTH THE COST
customer_reviews.text: This box was very easy to assemble and seems very well made. Holds cushions for seven deck chairs with room remaining for some small outside toys as well. It looks fantastic with the Ratan style. The latch could be a little stronger I guess but it is still adequate. I got it on sale for $112.00 and free shipping so don't pay full price if you don't have to (although it would be worth $145).
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Spin

customer_reviews.title: Warped and not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I own a Suncast Resin Rattan Deck Box purchased from Costco and it is great - not flimsy, waterproof and tight fitting lid. So I purchased another one last week. Material is not on par with the older deck box, it is not waterproof and the lid is warped. Beware of return policies - I have to ship it back at my own expense if I want a refund. Don't buy this item. UPDATED REVIEW - the hinges have broken off completely on one side. Don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Footloose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deck Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this deck box for my daughter's patio furniture cushions and it held 2 chaise lounge and 1 love seat and cushions for 2 chairs. I believe there is additional room left over for more items.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and large
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with this deck box. Using it for our outdoor cushions because the sun in Florida is too strong to leave them out in the sun. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sicily gal

customer_reviews.title: ENORMOUS! I can fit three bodies in it! ...
customer_reviews.text: ENORMOUS! I can fit three bodies in it!!!! Or all of my grill extras and chair pads for the outside chairs. I was concerned about moisture getting into the box as I was planning on storing my charcoal in here. I've had it a month and the charcoal has stayed bone dry!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Sweet box
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet pool side box. Holds everything we have for the pool with room left to spare. It was a bit nervy to assemble but as I did I could see that this is a sweet and good box for out door use.
customer_reviews.author: mcgsr

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely huge and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this box!!! It is huge! I struggled to put it tog by myself but it was just the perfect size to fit all my stuff. I was on over glow w my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: This storage container is nice looking, sturdy, and roomy. Holds eveything I need it too and then some!
customer_reviews.author: hcap

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after pretty minimal use. Had it for a year but has been opened and closed at most about 25 times. Hinge assembles are held in place with plastic parts that fit into holes in the plastic cover. End result is now broken and won’t close without being misaligned and very much not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and fairly easy to assemble. Nice looking. Likely will last a long time. Price is too high though. ts not worth what they're charging although there are no cheaper options that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Green Guy 33068

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The chest was warped and not easy to put together. The plastic molding leans to the right. This might be due to manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorbomb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but came missing a part of the lock
customer_reviews.author: Roberta de Lima Miranda

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.text: SOME OF THE PHOTOS IN THE DIRECTIONS COULD BE MORE DETAILED BUT THEY HAD ENOUGH TO GET YOU THROUGH IT EASILY. CALLING THE SUPPORT LINE WAS GREAT AS WELL AS THEY TALKED US THROUGH ONE OF THE CONFUSING PARTS OF THE INSTALLATION. THAT SERVICE WAS INCREDIBLY VALUABLE. IN THE END IT WAS OPERATOR ERROR ON OUR PART WITH INTERPRETING THE DIRECTIONS :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. They match my existing outdoor furniture and are very durable. Went together very easily and look awesome
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my cushions dry from Ohio weather! Looks great too! Glad I purchased this box.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was Not big enough to store 6 dinning patio chair covers.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Shell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box. Very flimsy.. first step was the latch!!! I had zero confidence this was going to work!! some Pieces of plastic broken off on inside of main box pieces. Farley simple assembly. Come to find out? I was right. Latch doesn’t hold.. very flimsy even when assembled. Will be returning to depot. VERY disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay closed tight.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks and how much it holds but it keeps popping open. The whole point was to keep all our cushions inside and dry but it will randomly unlatch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This did not hold up in the AZ heat.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not hold up in the heat. I kept it under my covered patio, but the plastic part that holds the hinged top broke. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Renee Bernat

customer_reviews.title: Storgage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, and it holds all my pillows for my outdoor furniture. It was roomier than I thought. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy girl

customer_reviews.title: Really great size for many cushions
customer_reviews.text: Really great size for many cushions, but mine never closed quite right, and the closing mechanism broke after about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Tons of waterproof storage and an easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Tons of waterproof storage and an easy open lid. Great price! We saw this same style but smaller for more money at our local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice box when assembly was finished but:
customer_reviews.text: Portions of the assembly instructions were not explained well enough. Tab and slot on two parts did not fit. I suggest listing the tools needed for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product went together fast and it doesn't leak like some reviews said. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and perfect size for patio set cushions. Seems it was custom made!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It is great for our needs
customer_reviews.text: It is great for our needs. Be careful and follow directions putting it together and you will be fine met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: Part that attached the lid broke within a week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: aimee wendrock

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst BOX EVER!!!!!!! The top does not stay closed. Very cheaply made. Very sad about this..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gorski

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. The plastic was splitting when we put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: dont leave on lawn as the water comes up from underneath
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: Because of the design, it leaks like a sieve. The top does not overlap the sides in all places. There are gaps in certain places where the sides meet the top.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I think I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Went together without issue, but then the pins that hold the top on started coming loose. One pin , then another. Ordered new pins, fixed the issue. Pins still come loose, which means always checking and knocking them back in. Now the top never stays in alignment. Very disappointed in this product. Unfortunately, the window of opportunity to return was gone 1 month after delivery. I've written to Suncast, awaitng a reply. In the meantime, I ordered the Keter Rockwood 150 gal. deck box which went together nicely and seems to be much better constructed. Plus it was 25 dollars less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: lisa zacchio

customer_reviews.title: DON'T buy this product - you will be disappointed for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the crappiest product I've ever bought from Amazon. It's flimsy, not well made and doesn't assemble well. And I paid $180 for it from Amazon and 2 days later they had it for sale for $127. DON'T buy this product - you will be disappointed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great.. I had a small problem with this but the Co took care of it right away!
customer_reviews.author: vi m pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great deck box! Keeps things dry and looks great on the deck!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

product_meta.title: Suncast 122-Gallon Waterproof Outdoor Storage Container Furniture, Pool Toys, and Yard Tools Store Items on Deck, Patio, and Porch, Java
product_meta.description: The wicker plastic storage container from Suncast is an attractive and highly versatile solution for use throughout your home and yard. The chest design and hinged lid allow for easy access to your tools and accessories. With a holding capacity of 122 gallons (52" x 28.75"x 26"), the deck box is compact and space-efficient, easily tucked away in your laundry room or garage. Use it on your deck to stow away patio cushions, gardening tools and grill accessories, or in your house to store boots, gloves, hats, and more. The weatherproof body will resist fading, while the rain water flows off of the box without pooling to keep your belongings dry and mildew-free. Constructed with durable and waterproof resin that is built to last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: DECK STORAGE BOX: Beautiful rattan outdoor box has a 122-gallon capacity for patio, deck, yard, porch, garage, and shed storage!
DURABLE: Water-resistant poly resin construction resists fading and rust to keep your box looking new for years to come
VERSATILE: Store pool toys, grill supplies, tools, gardening items, sports equipment, patio furniture, and more!
FUNCTIONAL LID: Lid flips open on hinges for easy access to your items. Rain water flows off of the box to prevent water pooling
LARGE SIZED: Storage box measures 28.75" x 52" x 26", the perfect size for your outdoor space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
